function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Methodological issues identified in the systematic review.","Impact":"Potential distortion of findings and conclusions.","Mitigation":"Improved study design, data collection, and analysis methods.","Technologies":"Advanced statistical analysis tools, data validation software.","People":"Researchers, authors, and reviewers.","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals."},{"Description":"High risk of bias in two studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Inaccurate or misleading findings about the effect of humidity on virus transmission.","Mitigation":"Use of more rigorous study designs, larger sample sizes, and robust statistical analysis.","Technologies":"Climate-controlled chambers, humidity sensors, statistical analysis software.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Moderate and low risk of bias in certain studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Potential inconsistency in the findings and conclusions of the studies.","Mitigation":"Standardization of study protocols, transparency in reporting methods, and peer review.","Technologies":"Data collection and monitoring devices, standardized research protocols.","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and policymakers.","Owner":"Academic institutions, research funding agencies."}]}
